description.message: Tieni traccia e gestisci gli aggiornamenti delle tue estensioni Chrome in un unico posto.

options_controls_mark_all_read.description: Button text to mark all updates as read

options_controls_sort_recent.description: Sort option for most recently updated extensions

options_loading.description: Loading indicator text for options page

options_update_item_view_web_store.description: Button text to view the extension on Chrome Web Store

options_extension_card_show_more.description: Button to show more version history. $1 is the number of hidden versions

options_extension_card_update_count.description: Shows the number of updates for an extension in extension card

options_extension_card_unread_count.description: Shows the number of unread updates in extension card

options_extension_card_expand.description: Action to expand a collapsed extension card

options_extension_card_collapse.description: Action to collapse an expanded extension card

options_extension_card_local_badge.description: Badge shown for locally installed (development) extensions

options_extension_card_aria_label.description: Aria label for extension card header

common_time_minute.description: Singular form of minute for common time utility

common_time_minutes.description: Plural form of minutes for common time utility

common_time_hour.description: Singular form of hour for common time utility

common_time_hours.description: Plural form of hours for common time utility

common_time_day.description: Singular form of day for common time utility

common_time_days.description: Plural form of days for common time utility

common_time_ago.description: Time ago suffix for common time utility

notification_title.description: Notification title when an extension is updated

notification_message.description: Notification message body with extension name and version details

notification_button_enable.description: Button to enable a disabled extension

notification_button_visit_website.description: Button to visit extension homepage/website in notification

popup_app_unread_updates.description: Label for unread updates count in popup

popup_app_total_updates.description: Label for total updates count in popup

popup_app_view_new_update.description: Button text to view a single new update in popup

popup_app_view_all_updates.description: Button text to view all updates in popup

popup_app_mark_all_read.description: Button to mark all updates as read in popup

popup_app_all_caught_up.description: Message when there are no unread updates in popup

popup_app_last_checked.description: Label for last check timestamp in popup

options_empty_no_updates.description: Message when no updates are available

options_empty_install_hint.message: Installa o aggiorna le estensioni per vederle qui

options_controls_show_unread_only.description: Checkbox label to filter unread updates

options_empty_no_unread.description: Message when filtering by unread shows no results

options_update_item_just_now.description: Time indicator for very recent activity

popup_app_just_now.description: Time indicator for very recent activity in popup app

common_time_just_now.description: Time indicator for very recent activity in time utility

options_settings_title.description: Settings panel title in options page

options_toolbar_settings_button.description: Settings button in the options page toolbar

options_settings_description.message: Configura le preferenze di notifica e il comportamento dell'estensione

options_settings_enable_notifications_de.message: Mostra le notifiche desktop quando le estensioni vengono aggiornate

options_settings_auto_close_timeout_desc.message: Chiudi automaticamente le notifiche dopo i secondi specificati (0 = mai)

options_settings_notification_sound_desc.message: Riproduci un suono quando appaiono le notifiche

options_settings_auto_disable_on_update_.message: Disabilita automaticamente le estensioni quando vengono aggiornate (funzione di sicurezza)

options_settings_mute_extension.description: Button to mute extension notifications in settings

options_settings_unmute_extension.description: Button to unmute extension notifications in settings

options_settings_reset_confirm.message: Sei sicuro di voler ripristinare tutte le impostazioni ai loro valori predefiniti?

options_settings_reset_dialog_title.description: Title for reset settings confirmation dialog

options_settings_reset_dialog_confirm.description: Confirm button text in reset settings dialog

options_settings_reset_dialog_cancel.description: Cancel button text in reset settings dialog

notification_welcome_message.message: Grazie per l'installazione! Riceverai notifiche quando le tue estensioni si aggiornano. Controlla la pagina degli aggiornamenti per vedere tutte le modifiche.

notification_welcome_button_view_updates.description: Button to open updates page from welcome notification

options_page_document_title.description: Document title for the options page

options_stats_total_updates_aria.description: Aria label for total updates badge

options_stats_unread_updates_aria.description: Aria label for unread updates badge

options_update_item_aria_label_read.description: Aria label for read update item

options_update_item_aria_label_unread.description: Aria label for unread update item

options_update_item_new_badge_aria.description: Aria label for new/unread update badge
